channel.title: Cape ONLY animation?
channel.description: hey, im new at making adimations etc adding them, and i made a new cape, but now i wanna get it to do the anim like my other custom capes (my test source already had) i want them to be able to move, not just stay there. any one got a idea how? please give me link/tell me what to do, im new so act like im 8, lol.

item.title: Cape ONLY animation?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

wth does a command have to do with any thing? , oh! if you mean like a skillcape emote, no i dont mean that, i mean like, i made a cape my self in mesquioa or w.e, then added it ingame (witch has all capes moving round with new animations and stuff) but mine doesnt, it just floats around the shoulders.
